original_title: Little White Chicks...Big Black Monster Dicks 10: Monster Pimpin'
overview: Someone help! They're back, terrorizing little innocent white girls as usual, but this time they've gone too far! Can you believe it? I hope the vice cops bust them all, lock them up & throw away the key!
title: Little White Chicks...Big Black Monster Dicks 10: Monster Pimpin'
